name: DataCategory

methods.name: getChildCategories
methods.description: Returns a recursive object that contains the visible sub categories in the data category.

methods.name: getLabel
methods.description: Returns the label for the data category used in the Salesforce user interface.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the unique name used by the API to access to the data category.

description: Represents the categories within a category group.
